website_summaries.verdict: This rice cooker includes a "My Way" mode which remembers exactly how you like your food cooked.
pros: Non-stick coating for the inner pot
cons: Has a lot of functionality, but does not include a steam container like many rice cookers on the market

customer_reviews.title: The metal on the pot inside has melted!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rice cooker in May 2018 and I've noticed that the metal on the metal pot inside the cooker has started to corrode. It looks like whatever the pot has been coated in is beginning to melt off. I've owned several rice cookers before and I've never experienced anything like this. I'm not sure when this started to occur because when rice is in the pot, you can't tell between the material that has become exposed to the rice in the pot. I have contacted Cuckoo directly but have yet to hear back. The quality of this pot is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Japanese well know brand rice cooker for some times now. The inner pot started peeling and got into the cooked rice. I've heard a lot of good things about Cuckoo and decided to try since it was on sale. The result.. oh my!! The rice came out so delicious! Multifunction as well. You will not regret!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Panda

customer_reviews.title: This appliance is worth the space.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how I'd feel about a rice cooker, but I saw a few recipes, that didn't include rice, but cooked in a rice cooker. They are more versatile than I once thought. I love it! It's so easy, and the rice is better than what I make on the stove, and a zillion times better than instant. About 10 minutes before the rice is ready, there is this wonderful smell. Like rice, but better than rice ever smelled, in the history of cooking rice. I'm sorry I didn't get a rice cooker sooner. If I'd known, I would have.
customer_reviews.author: nikki mc mains

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but not made in Korea
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but not made in Korea. Made in China, so I ended up to return it, and get a pink one that made in Korea.
customer_reviews.author: Thousand Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Good Rice But Takes Forever to Cook
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Cooks rice well -Adaptable to all sorts of different grains -Very easy to clean -Quality teflon pot -Once set up properly, easy to use. Cons: -Not intuitive -I'm not sure the rice is any better than my cheaper rice cooker made -Takes forever--we're talking over an hour for 2 cups of brown rice to cook -Heavy, bulky and either takes up a lot of counter space or has to be stored but doesn't have anything to hold onto for moving it. Edit: After a few months, it's also now sometimes doing keep warm instead of cook, which looks very similar. Twice now we've had to take it out of the cooker and finish it on the stove. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allison N Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Press those buttons HARD
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is okay for the price. I like the design/color and it is simple to use. I just wanted to let others know that you have to press hard on the buttons. I mean you don't have to press really hard, but harder than other rice cookers I've owned. I've owned more expensive Cuckoo rice cooker and a few Zojirushi. Also, the quick mode isn't as quick as other rice cookers I've owned, including their own Cuckoo models (more expensive ones). Maybe this is the differentiating factor. Well, the rice does taste good. (but not fabulous, either.)
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Quality rice cooker from Cuckoo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rice cooker and cheap as well. I eat rice everyday all my life. For the past several months no issues at all. Very reliable and it does the job flawlessly. For those in the market looking for a rice cooker, Cuckoo is a leading (dominating) brand in South Korea and i suggest get yourself one at a lower price.. this particular one has no difference from that of $500 cooker. The small size it is and little less than few functions but taste is the same.
customer_reviews.author: avoncreek

customer_reviews.title: One of my best kitchen purchases
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit. Love the porridge, steam, and gaba rice options. I had no idea how much I would use this product & the rice turns out perfect. I really like the time function where I can set the time when I want it to complete, and it will start on its own and will default to warm when it gets to the set time. Also like the design, and red and white looks great in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: onegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my rice cooker! It gets the job done. I haven't had any problems listed in the reviews. I made sure to read the instructions and use the measuring cup provided and have had tasty rice after the first couple tries! I use my rice cooker very often and very pleased with it! Also I love the color. My only complaint is i wish it had the holder for the rice scooper. My friend had the pink version (same brand) and it had the holder on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Lorron

customer_reviews.title: Stays WARM for days !!!!! It hits way above it's price point.
customer_reviews.text: I searched around for a decent rice cooker. My wife is Asian who loves to eat white rice. Her family owns a restaurant so she hates a cheap rice cooker. She loved this one as soon as we got it. Unlike most rice cookers on Amazon it will stay on warm for days at a time. Its perfect because we will cook rice before we go to bed and as soon as we wake up .it's ready to start eating. Rice is fluffy,not soggy. I would suggest this to anyone who is an avid rice eater.
customer_reviews.author: Honest_Judge

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a week and rice still smells of strong chemicals. The inner part of the rice maker smelled chemically so we wipe it down every day but still have not able to get rid of the smell. Owned dozens of rice cookers in life but never ever had this issue in the past.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had two smaller, simple one-click rice cookers, but they do not stack up against this one. It was recommended to me by a Korean-American friend of mine and I am so impressed. It does take a little longer to cook, but we use the "warming" feature and leave it on the counter for 2-3 days so that we can have warm rice any time we want it! It is easy to use and very easy to clean as well as very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Keene

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The best homemade rice I’ve ever had. Lasts in machine for days staying sticky and moist! The only bummer is they don’t sell a separate nonstick pit that goes within the machine. So when we got a little chip on the Teflon we had to buy the whole machine. This thing is so great though we forked you the money for the whole machine with the new Teflon pot.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker. My old one was an Oster, cheap, easy to use, and last almost 10 years. But this Cuckoo brand doesn’t even compare. I made sushi rice and jasmine rice in it, and comes out perfectly cooked each time. The size is perfect, it doesn’t stick to the bottom of the bowl or turn a yellowish color on the bottom. The inner pot is easy to clean, super easy to use. So glad I went for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Only two issues with this rice cooker: when the lid opens, the entire cooker moves which is different than my other rice cooker that doesn't open as aggressively as this cuckoo and other issue is no spoon holder. It cooks decent rice and comparatively inexpensive to the japanese brand.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kong

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how to fix it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this rice cooker till the detached cover broke:( so sad.it says 1 year warranty so hopefully they will do something about it if they do i will let u guys know.
customer_reviews.author: Khatanbaatar Zorig

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cooks rice evenly compared to my old cheap one. Although I don’t think it’s an actual pressure rice cooker, it cooks just as well and keeps the rice good to eat for 2-3 days. This Korean approves.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Working properly
customer_reviews.text: Cuckoo is an expensive rice cooker but the price on here was reasonable and it was the right size. As long as you follow the directions, it works the way it should
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rice cooker. My favorite part is the color and the modern egg looking shape of it. It cooks the rice perfectly! Easy to clean and the rice comes out great each time.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa K.

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals smelling/tasting
customer_reviews.text: Strong chemicals smelling ... even the rice have chemicals tasting. Don’t know if it’s safe. Edited: after two months still smell some kind of chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have used a Tiger rice cooker for the longest time. I decided to order this one instead when we needed a new rice cooker. This rice cooker is amazing! The rice is cooked so well, there are different settings that you can choose depending on what kind of rice you are making. My rice has never cooked any better! It takes time to get how to use it, but once you get it, it is easy and great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like its simpleness and ease to use. However, it is a bit difficult to clean. You cannot use a dishwasher and clean it by your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Seo

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought another one
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much this is my second one actually. We have two homes and I now have one of these in each home. Works perfectly and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

customer_reviews.title: Teflon coating is peeling off but otherwise works well. So far.
customer_reviews.text: The Teflon coating is coming off like a few have mentioned before. The cooker itself works well. However, if all you are doing is cooking rice, then you should get the more basic models since they will do the job just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Park

customer_reviews.title: Rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law had one so when my rice cooker went kaput I got this. Easy to use, mainly for rice. Need to use instructions to understand all the uses. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: HMMMM

customer_reviews.title: Works great- looks cute...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cute little thing and we no longer waste half the rice she used to cook in a big rice cooker. For me it just looks cute in the kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: Z. George

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived timely. It has a nice design, not to small, but not very big either. However, everything is on the heavy side including the inside pot. I keep it on the counter for that reason. I wish it would have been lighter so I can store it easier, as I have a disability, but it will have to do on the counter. I haven't used it very much so far, maybe twice, so I can't say much, but so far, the rice was nicely cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Dha Nhi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, easy to clean, cooks quickly, and rice is fresh for a week!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE our new rice cooker! Perfect size for me and my hubby.. I will make 4 cups and that'll last us a week.. the rice doesn't dry out in this like it did in our old rice cooker... Keeps it fresh!! Cooks brown rice perfectly too. Very happy with it. Oh, and it's cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Russ

customer_reviews.title: Best Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: It make rice really fast and deliciously. I used many other cheap rice cooker. But The rice is not be riped or not good quaility. But This Cooker make perfectly what I imagine. I really satisfy with this cooker. I recommend this cooker to anyone who likes rice.
customer_reviews.author: kwonminki

customer_reviews.title: Best ones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker. So far its one of the best rice cooker out there without breaking your bank. The rice stay good for up to 3-4 days, even after that the rice does not smell bad like the other rice cooker I had. I used to have a tiger and it still wouldn’t keep my rice that long. I would recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Chor Vang

customer_reviews.title: chemicals semlls
customer_reviews.text: over 2 months now but rice still smells of strong chemicals. I can not use anymore time!
customer_reviews.author: Taewoo Kim

customer_reviews.title: Small, but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and the price is very reasonable. I'll give it to my son when he goes back to dorm.
customer_reviews.author: YJ Lee

customer_reviews.title: Reliable as usual
customer_reviews.text: The best value rice cooker for its price. We have been using Cuckoo for years back in Korea and this is the one we purchased after we moved into the states. Seems as good as it can get.
customer_reviews.author: David Kim

customer_reviews.title: this was a little cheaper model the other one sounded like a train when rice was cooked this one goes ...
customer_reviews.text: have used cuckoo rice cookers before, this was a little cheaper model the other one sounded like a train when rice was cooked this one goes ding. the rice cooks very well white rice or brown. our friends saw how our rice cooker worked and also bought one, so i guess i would recommend this rick cooker to anyone interested in a good rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Best rice cooker ever! It’s keeps the rice nice and moist after leaving it in the “keep warm” setting for over 8 hours! Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing haven’t tried on anything other then rice yet but makes rice perfectly every time. No mater how many servings you are making!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: Great design and works well! It’s great value for the price you pay! So far I have had no problems with this company been using them for years now!
customer_reviews.author: Sang

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & really great for cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, and received it as a birthday gift. The only downside is that the instructions are confusing to me, but I haven’t had any issues with cooking it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Gage & Britt Newton

customer_reviews.title: Be aware when buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Awful experience, the first day, I was really excited about it, after that day the machine didn’t turned on anymore, so now it is a just a beautiful paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooked! Easy and fast cooking times.... perfect every time. Made the mistake of dumping in the rice into the cooker without the pot inside. Thought I broke it... but all I had to do was unscrew the 4 screws at the bottom and shook all the rice out! Works great still!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Morton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works well. I bought this almost a year ago and is still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell !!
customer_reviews.text: It had this weird smell-like something burning when I first used it. It is getting better and better each time but still it is not gone completely. Cuckoo products are usually great but I would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Sodapop

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and quick!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and so far it looks really good. The rice tastes good and fresh, and cooks pretty fast. Only qualm about this rice cooker is that the lid pops back and can tip over the rice cooker, so open cautiously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I like the timer that count downs to when the rice will be ready.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: If you really like eating rice, and live alone, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great looking rice cooker and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and this works perfectly for me and looks great as well. Quality is excellent as well
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Korean rice cooker is the best!
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time to get it, but it is worth it. Korean rice cooker is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Hyejin Park

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice every time !!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice every time. Interface is very intuitive. I get a lot of complements on the look of it. LOVE the self clean feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: The rice cooker is nice and work perfectly, But the delivery was mishandled and caused the damage of the packaging. I am very not please with it when I first received the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, price, shipping
customer_reviews.text: High quality with my favourite color! Price is competitive 😇
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! Super easy to use and rice comes out very tasty !!! I’ve bought one for myself and 2 as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: great product. easy to use, easy to clean. keeps rice warm for days!!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the price, this rice cooker is fantastic to use! The rice gets ready in less than 30 minutes and is very easy to make. There is also a self-cleaning option to keep the rice cooker clean and sanitized. My rice tastes very yummy since I've been using this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I've been reading various online reviews, and was able to purchase this on sale on Amazon. Amazing rice cooker - flavor; second to none. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area resident

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It cooks rice well and even though it lacks some of the advanced features of pricier cookers, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker the Cuckoo brand makes the best rice cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Mushy Rice
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how the rice came out. Too mushy for me
customer_reviews.author: Spirit of Nader

customer_reviews.title: the cooker for years
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Cuckoo rice cooker for more than 8 years, the best rice taste I love.
customer_reviews.author: liusixteen

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift in Jan 2018, used it once. After that ONE use, the buttons stopped working (they don't make any sound and nothing shows on display) it also just starts getting hot the minute it is plugged in and does not stop getting hot until I unplug it... EXTREMELY disappointed. Had better results with my little $30 cooker...
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Having good cooked rice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Definitely doesn’t burn the rice even if it was kept on warm overnight! Cooks within 30 minutes and rice is always perfect!
customer_reviews.author: aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rice cooker. Brown rice, white rice, even mixed rice with dried beans comes out perfectly. I've used it to cook steel cut oatmeal too. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mac

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Price is good And everything is good I like it Thank You
customer_reviews.author: catherine h kim

customer_reviews.title: The best Rice Cooker I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: It’s great but there is some problem about stability during open the lid. Maybe the lid is too heavy compare to the pot. But it’s good anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Chalerm

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: As I was told, this Korean rice cooker is the best one for even keeping it warm.
customer_reviews.author: Heejung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great little thing
customer_reviews.text: Great little thing! Cooks well and love the display. Brown rice takes forever to cook but it cooks it good.
customer_reviews.author: Undomestic Goddess

customer_reviews.title: cheap and big
customer_reviews.text: can put a lot of rice in! and it's not expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 10months, and it is really working well
customer_reviews.author: yscho

customer_reviews.title: Multi setting
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited that I always have fresh rice even at 72hrs..like it so much I purchase one for my parent's
customer_reviews.author: Queen MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to attach rubber packing after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jaekwang Kim

customer_reviews.title: Got rice?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice. Easy to use. So happy with this appliance
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.title: Cute rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Having a a carrying handle would be a nice addition
customer_reviews.author: Yoboyah

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Hard the first time, but easy once you get the hang of it and it makes the best rice I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Christopher Hojnacki

customer_reviews.title: SLOW COOK TIME
customer_reviews.text: Poorly written English manual. AND very slow cook time for everything. No quick cook option. Everything takes 40 - over 60 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this rice cooker it the best. No waste
customer_reviews.text: i have my rice cooker in life, but this rice cooker it the best. No waste. I eat rice every day, three time a day. I have put my old rice cooker in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and quick
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and quick. Easy to read and push buttons to begin cooking. Highly recommend and for this price. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Brown

customer_reviews.title: rice taste not good enough 3
customer_reviews.text: 1.small fast ricecooking 2.one day after cook, rice taste not good enough 3.not pressure cooker
customer_reviews.author: kookhee y.

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is absolutely amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is absolutely amazing for the price. It has so many functionalities, such as self-cleaning, timer, and options to cook various types of food. My favorite part is the timer. Before I leave home for work in the morning, I would set the timer on the rice cooker to have the rice cooked by 5:30pm, and when I get back home, the rice is already ready for me to eat. As a note, this is a larger rice cooker meant for up to 6 servings.
customer_reviews.author: mitarcher

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. We are only two in the house. I eat rice everyday. I agree it’s not quite as nice as the cuckoo I had in Korea, but it is much much nicer than a cheap rice cooker and a lot cheaper than a fancy one while being like 90% as good. I do think the bowl isn’t as nice so I have a plastic rice washer I wash my rice in before putting it in my machine. This will preserve the non-stick coating longer.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Halford

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: Instruction was not helpful and I have been using rice cooker all my life including fancy type with various menu. I still find it hard to figure out what menu to use for what rice and the water level. Not great for Jasmine rice or if you like to cook rice with meet and vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Madiloggovit

customer_reviews.title: This one’s your baby—plus it’s adorable
customer_reviews.text: I did have a little trouble getting started, wasn’t sure what setting to use for my jasmine rice, but once I figured it out—perfect rice every single time. Not sure whether it’s worth the counter space; I have an auxiliary pantry where I can store large-ish appliances between uses. But if you make rice every day, or every meal, this one is your baby.
customer_reviews.author: KreepyGrrl

customer_reviews.title: plus I do like exotic grains that have been perfectly cooked
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a machine! It steams vegetables, plus I do like exotic grains that have been perfectly cooked. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Makes great rice. The big advantage of this rice cooker ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes great rice. The big advantage of this rice cooker over the American and Chinese rice cooker I previously owned is that the rice keeps very long. Is you don't need all the rice, just leave it in and eat it during the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: tobiwankenobi

customer_reviews.title: Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: Just can't go wrong with Cuckoo brand. My first one is still working flawlessly after 10 years of daily use
customer_reviews.author: Tae K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rice cooker. It's so upgraded and has so much features. So far I've only used the mix cook but I love how my rice comes out.
customer_reviews.author: a romantic

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker ever made
customer_reviews.text: We eat over 20lbs of rice a month. This is the best rice cooker we have ever owned. It has never burned our rice and it keeps it good for over 24 hours. No more wasting food!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Best Rice cooker I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm so glad I got this Cuckoo, it's aesthetically pleasing and it makes fantastic rice.y previous rice cooker (very cheap one) was a pain to clean and rice always stuck to it. I've never had a problem cleaning my Cuckoo or rice sticking to it. There are so many settings to choose from, I haven't used them all but the ones I have made super tasty rice!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love it. cheaper than compare with an other
customer_reviews.text: I love it. cheaper than compare with an other .....Pretty design cook fast and good taste ..easy used ....Recommend for every one. But only 6 month inner pot began peel off. I'm still looking for replace inner pot because rice cooker very good and it expensed i don't want through away
customer_reviews.author: mimi warmmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized rice cooker for smaller households
customer_reviews.text: Cooked my rice perfectly, can't add more than that because its only purpose is to rice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to use. A little cheaper here at Amazon. It was more pricier at the Asian market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This rice cooker has a sleek design and is easy to use (once you understand the buttons you need to press to cook rice) and no hassle to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best rice cooker I’ve had. Non-stick is high quality. Excellent features and results!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Rice doesn't stick to pot even after several days
customer_reviews.text: Best rice cooker so far. Rice stays warm and not stick to the pot for several days. Definitely beats my old brand of Aroma.
customer_reviews.author: ajdfadjfa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker! Works great and the rice comes out delicious! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Coating chipping
customer_reviews.text: I like the features. However, after using it less than a dozen times, the coating in the pot started chipping off. I only use the designated spoon for it as well.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: I love this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker! I have made so many things other than rice in it because it is multipurpose. The rice comes out great every time and I can push the button and walk away from it without worrying that the rice will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... rice almost everyday with this cooker and am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I cook brown rice almost everyday with this cooker and am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam8726

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love my rice cooker. It is easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: this one's the best among all I have used
customer_reviews.text: I used many rice cookers before, from very cheap ones to more than $300 pressure cookers. In terms of taste of rice and how well it preserves the rice, this one's the best among all I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Keun Choi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste of your money. used couple times and doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Kim

product_meta.title: Cuckoo CR-0655F Rice Cooker & Warmer, 6 Cups, LCD-Display 11-Menu Options, Turbo, Mixed, and Brown/GABA, Porridge, Steam MultiCook, My Mode, 16-Various Cooking Methods, Small, Red/White
